message: Let's start fair. I'm willing to give you a good chunk of the money.  What do you think?
I'll take half, it's a fair start.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than half. Let's be reasonable.
I'll take a slightly bigger share, but I'm willing to compromise.
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to give you a fair share, but I'm not going to let you take most of the money.  Let's agree now and avoid the risk of losing everything.
I'm taking a bigger share now, since the money is decreasing in value.
Time is running out.  I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but let's avoid losing everything. It's better to get something than nothing.
I'll take almost all the money now, since it's worth less and less with each round.
We're getting close to the end. Let's avoid losing everything! I'm offering you a small share but it's better than nothing.
I'll take almost all the money, it's the best I can get at this point.
This is my final attempt. I'm offering you a very small share, but it's better than nothing. Let's end this before we lose everything!
I'll take it all, since I have no choice and the money is almost worthless anyway.
